# Quick Start - Daily Commit Summary

Setup cepat untuk workflow Daily Commit Summary to Google Calendar.

## ‚ö° 5 Menit Setup

### 1Ô∏è‚É£ Google Cloud Console (5 menit)

```bash
1. Buka: https://console.cloud.google.com/
2. Buat project baru: "github-actions-calendar"
3. Enable API: Google Calendar API
4. Buat Service Account: "github-actions-calendar"
5. Download JSON key (simpan aman!)
6. Copy service account email (contoh: github-actions-calendar@xxx.iam.gserviceaccount.com)
```

### 2Ô∏è‚É£ Google Calendar (2 menit)

```bash
1. Buka: https://calendar.google.com/
2. Settings ‚Üí pilih calendar
3. Share with specific people
4. Add: [service account email dari step 1.6]
5. Permission: "Make changes to events"
6. Copy Calendar ID (di Integrate calendar section)
```

### 3Ô∏è‚É£ GitHub Secrets (2 menit)

```bash
1. Repository ‚Üí Settings ‚Üí Secrets and variables ‚Üí Actions
2. New repository secret:
   
   Name: GOOGLE_SERVICE_ACCOUNT_KEY
   Value: [paste seluruh isi JSON file dari step 1.5]
   
3. New repository secret:
   
   Name: GOOGLE_CALENDAR_ID
   Value: [Calendar ID dari step 2.6]
```

### 4Ô∏è‚É£ Test Run (3 menit)

```bash
1. Actions tab ‚Üí "Daily Commit Summary to Google Calendar"
2. Run workflow ‚Üí pilih branch ‚Üí Run workflow
3. Tunggu ~2-3 menit
4. Check Google Calendar untuk event baru
```

## ‚úÖ Checklist

- [ ] Google Cloud project dibuat
- [ ] Calendar API enabled
- [ ] Service Account dibuat dan key downloaded
- [ ] Calendar di-share dengan service account
- [ ] Calendar ID didapat
- [ ] GitHub secret `GOOGLE_SERVICE_ACCOUNT_KEY` di-set
- [ ] GitHub secret `GOOGLE_CALENDAR_ID` di-set
- [ ] Test workflow run berhasil
- [ ] Event muncul di Google Calendar

## üéØ Hasil Akhir

Setelah setup selesai:

- ‚úÖ Workflow berjalan **otomatis setiap hari jam 06:00 WITA**
- ‚úÖ Mengumpulkan commit dari **hari kemarin**
- ‚úÖ AI (Ollama llama3.2) membuat **ringkasan profesional**
- ‚úÖ Event otomatis ditambahkan ke **Google Calendar**
- ‚úÖ Format: `üìù [AI Summary Title]` dengan detail lengkap

## üìã Contoh Event di Calendar

```
üìù Implemented Google Calendar Integration & Daily Commit Automation

Date: 2025-12-14 (Yesterday)
Calendar: Your Calendar
Color: Blue

Description:
Implemented comprehensive Google Calendar integration with OAuth 2.0 
authentication. Created automated GitHub Actions workflow for daily 
commit summarization using Ollama llama3.2 AI model. Key achievements:
- Google Calendar component with full UI matching Google's design
- OAuth 2.0 authentication flow
- My Calendars and Other Calendars sections
- Event detail modal with complete information
- Automated workflow with cron scheduling at 06:00 WITA

---
Generated by GitHub Actions
Repository: xlp0/LandingPage
Workflow: Daily Commit Summary
```

## üîß Troubleshooting Cepat

| Problem | Solution |
|---------|----------|
| "Permission denied" | Re-share calendar dengan service account |
| "Invalid credentials" | Generate new key & update secret |
| "No commits found" | Normal - tidak ada commit kemarin |
| "API not enabled" | Enable Google Calendar API di Cloud Console |
| Event tidak muncul | Check workflow logs di Actions tab |

## üìö Dokumentasi Lengkap

- **Setup Detail**: `.github/scripts/setup-google-calendar.md`
- **Workflow Docs**: `.github/workflows/README-DAILY-COMMIT-SUMMARY.md`
- **Test Script**: `.github/scripts/test-commit-summary.sh`

## üÜò Butuh Bantuan?

1. Check workflow logs: Actions ‚Üí pilih run ‚Üí klik job
2. Download artifacts untuk debugging
3. Baca troubleshooting di README-DAILY-COMMIT-SUMMARY.md
4. Verify semua secrets sudah benar
